metaknowledge

A Python3 Library for Bibliometric and Sociology of Knowledge Research.

Examples

  • Extract Text You want to extract textual data to analyze.
  • Contruct a Multi-Mode Network You want to construct a Multi-Mode Network.
  • Contruct a Journal Co-Citation Network You want to construct a Weighted Co-Citation Network of Journals.
  • Contruct a Document Co-Citation Network You want to construct a weighted co-citation network of documents.
  • Contruct a Data Frame You want to construct a dataset from a folder of Web of Science files.
  • Contruct a Co-Author Network You want to construct a weighted network of co-authors.
  • Contruct a Citation Network You want to construct a weighted citation network.
  • Contruct an Author Co-Citation Network You want to construct a weighted co-citation network of authors.
